channel.title: Server help
channel.description: i think its a made server, i downloaded it from here, its called satan's isle. i wanna know how to use it

item.title: Server help
item.dc:creator: @JBJr JBJr
item.description:
@JBJr wrote:

You either need to get a no-ip or a Hamachi.

I dont know much about no-ip, so I’ll teach you about Hamachi (sorry)

Go to this link: http://www.hamachi.cc/download/list.php

Download the first download link that pops up (english version)
Go through the step by step thing that Hamachi gives you (very easy)

Then you need to make a network when your Hamachi window pops up.
Go to the triangle thing in the bottom of you Hamachi window, and click ‘Create a Network’
Name it w/e you want, then put an easy password (like 123) so someone can join your network and play your server.

After you have created your network, you have gotten your server online.

Hope that helped!

–JBJr

Read full topic
